title: 帮忙看下崩服原因
txt_content:

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Willam_Che
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 隔壁柴先生
replies.txt_content:
由实体引发的错误
打开\config\forget.cfg 
找到removeErroringEntities及removeErroringTileEntities两个选项将他们都改为true
这是让你在遇到错误实体时自动删除而不是关闭服务端发生崩溃报告
Details:
        Entity Type: null (net.lrsoft.mrblade.entity.EntityCraftRev)
        Entity ID: 548581
        Entity Name: unknown
        Entity's Exact location: 70.48, 71.64, 22.59
        Entity's Block location: World: (70,71,22), Chunk: (at 6,4,6 in 4,1; contains blocks 64,0,16 to 79,255,31), Region: (0,0; contains chunks 0,0 to 31,31, blocks 0,0,0 to 511,255,511)
        Entity's Momentum: 0.00, 0.00, 0.00复制代码

replies.author: xinyang0326
replies.txt_content: 在地皮世界70,71,22 有个未知实体卡区块了，经过计算在r.0.0. mca文件，位于chunk4.1,因为是地皮世界推荐使用NBT explorer无损修复！
